algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by dividing the element-wise product of the rest capacity of the bin and the item size by the maximum bin capacity, then multiplying it by the inverse of the square root of the sum of the rest capacities of all the bins, and finally multiplying it by the square root of (1 - item_size / max_capacity).
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    rest_capacity = max_capacity - bins
    rest_capacity_sum = np.sum(rest_capacity)
    scores = (rest_capacity * item) / max_capacity * (1 / np.sqrt(rest_capacity_sum)) * np.sqrt(1 - item / max_capacity)
    return scores
